channel.title: Editing how much things cost and drop
channel.description: how do i edit what things drop and what the droprate for that item is? and also how do i change the cost of items in shop?

item.title: Editing how much things cost and drop
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

jessie thompson:

wait so the npc drops are random?

As #Haste stated the Npcdrops are at a random point. Though making a second line is the rare drops in which you can control on how often the rare items are dropped.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing how much things cost and drop
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

For drop rates and what items does an npc drop , go to npcdrops.cfg

This is an example of Fire Giant drop ratings , etc.

npcdrop = 277	6898	1	15

It goes like this

Npc ID , ItemID , Amount , Chance. ( In this case its 15% )

To change how much the item costs go to item.cfg

The second set of digits is its Price.
The first is low alch , The third is high alch.

Read full topic
item.source: Editing how much things cost and drop
